channel.title: How do i do it?
channel.description:
[b]Hello[/b]
I have downloaded the xlinescape 2.7 and i need help. I can run server with compile bat thanks to "mod tahoroks perfeckt compiler". Now i have made networks on hamachi. When i then get them online and run server with compiler bat pepople message me that they cant get on my server when they use the ip that i have on top of my hamachi menu. I can get on it self with that ip but they cant. How do i get my server online. People says to me that i must put it online .. how can i do that then ?? I would be happy if someone tells me this or if someone (you!!) can tell me how to make no-ip server. I have been on No-op.com and made an account but when i tried to make ip thing i dont know how to do i need instrucktions!!! i would be so happy if someone can telle me i appreciate it :) Plz help me :D

item.title: How do i do it?
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

No-ip.com Tutorial:

1.) Go To www.no-ip.com

2.) Login Or Register.

3.) When You First Log In, On The Left Side-Bar, Click On Add Host

4.) This Is What You Will Need To Put In The Blanks:
(In The Ip Address Area, It Should Automatically Be Filled)

5.) Create The Host.

6.) Go To Downloads At The Top Of Your Screen On No-ip And Click On Windows Version, Then Download The No-ip Client.

7.) Now Go Onto Your No-Ip Client, And Check The Box Of Your Host.

8.) Your Done! (Tell Me If Theres Anything Wrong With This Guide)

I Hope This Helped You

Read full topic
